title: Implement Strategy pattern for movement
description: MovementStrategy interface with different implementations: StandardMovement, WrappingMovement, BouncingMovement

title: Setup Prometheus metrics
description: Add counters for moves, collisions, food eaten; gauges for snake length; histograms for move duration

title: Implement repository interfaces
description: Create internal/domain/repository package with GameStateRepository, EventStoreRepository interfaces

title: Add health check endpoints
description: /health, /ready, /live endpoints for K8s probes

title: Epic: Implement Event Sourcing
description: Store all game events (moves, collisions, food spawns) in event store for complete game replay and time travel debugging

title: Add feature flags with environment variables
description: Toggle features: event_sourcing, caching, analytics, microservices mode

title: Add WebSocket server for multiplayer
description: gorilla/websocket for real-time game state sync, room management

title: Create performance benchmarks
description: Go benchmarks for critical paths, load testing with k6

title: Implement CollisionDetector microservice
description: Dedicated service for collision detection with spatial indexing

title: Build infrastructure adapters
description: Create internal/infrastructure/persistence for PostgreSQL, Redis adapters implementing repository interfaces

title: Add achievements/badges system
description: Event-driven achievement tracking (first kill, 100 points, speedrun)

title: Create application service layer
description: Implement internal/application/services with GameService, MovementService, CollisionService

title: Add Kubernetes manifests
description: Deployments, Services, ConfigMaps, Secrets, HPA for all microservices

title: Epic: Add Configuration Management
description: Viper for config, support YAML/JSON/ENV, feature flags with LaunchDarkly integration

title: Add game event projections
description: Create read models from event stream for score, leaderboard, game history

title: Add State pattern for game states
description: GameState interface: MenuState, PlayingState, PausedState, GameOverState with transitions

title: Add PostgreSQL schema with migrations
description: Create schema for game_sessions, snake_states, high_scores tables with golang-migrate

title: Setup Viper configuration
description: config.yaml with all game parameters, environment-specific configs (dev/staging/prod)

title: Implement Redis caching layer
description: Cache current game state, leaderboards with TTL, implement cache-aside pattern

title: Create admin dashboard
description: Web UI for monitoring games, viewing metrics, managing players

title: Add monitoring alerting
description: AlertManager rules for high latency, error rates, service downtime

title: Setup Kafka message broker
description: Create topics: game.events, collisions.detected, food.spawned. Add producer/consumer implementations

title: Implement structured logging with zerolog
description: Replace all logging with zerolog, add correlation IDs, log sampling for high-frequency events

title: Create game replay system
description: Store and replay games from event log, time-travel debugging UI

title: Epic: Database Layer with Repository Pattern
description: Add PostgreSQL for game state, Redis for caching, MongoDB for analytics. Implement repository pattern with interfaces

title: Implement REST API with OpenAPI spec
description: Swagger/OpenAPI 3.0 spec, code generation with oapi-codegen, versioned endpoints

title: Epic: Implement Design Patterns Showcase
description: Factory, Builder, Singleton, Strategy, Observer, Command, State, Decorator patterns throughout codebase

title: Add CI/CD pipeline
description: GitHub Actions: lint, test, build, security scan, Docker build/push

title: Implement Command pattern for input
description: MoveCommand, TurnCommand with undo/redo support for game replay

title: Create data analytics pipeline
description: ETL pipeline to data warehouse (Snowflake/BigQuery), BI dashboards

title: Add API Gateway
description: Traefik or Kong for routing, load balancing, API composition

title: Implement event store with NATS JetStream
description: Add NATS server, create event types (SnakeMoved, FoodEaten, CollisionOccurred), implement event publisher/subscriber

title: Epic: Refactor to Clean Architecture
description: Transform single-file game into layered architecture with domain, application, infrastructure, and presentation layers

title: Implement Helm charts
description: Parameterized Helm chart for multi-environment deployments

title: Implement leaderboard service
description: Redis sorted sets for global/daily/weekly leaderboards

title: Epic: Implement CQRS Pattern
description: Separate read and write models for game state with command handlers and query handlers

title: Create Docker Compose stack
description: Compose file with all services: postgres, redis, mongodb, kafka, jaeger, prometheus, grafana

title: Epic: Add Microservices Architecture
description: Split game into separate services: GameEngine, CollisionDetector, FoodGenerator, ScoreTracker, RenderingService with gRPC communication

title: Create comprehensive test suite
description: Unit tests (90% coverage), integration tests, e2e tests with testify and gomock

title: Add authentication/authorization
description: JWT tokens, OAuth2, role-based access control (RBAC)

title: Implement saga pattern for distributed transactions
description: Orchestration-based saga for complex game operations across services

title: Add circuit breaker pattern
description: gobreaker for protecting service calls, fallback strategies

title: Add documentation site
description: mkdocs or docusaurus with architecture diagrams, API docs, deployment guides

title: Implement graceful shutdown
description: Signal handling, drain connections, save game state on shutdown

title: Epic: Add Observability Stack
description: OpenTelemetry traces, Prometheus metrics, structured logging, distributed tracing across all 'microservices'

title: Add OpenTelemetry tracing
description: Instrument all services with OTEL, export to Jaeger, trace snake movements across service boundaries

title: Implement GameEngine microservice
description: Separate service handling core game loop, state management

title: Implement Factory pattern for entities
description: SnakeFactory, PointFactory with validation and business rules

title: Implement chaos engineering tests
description: Chaos Mesh experiments: network latency, pod failures, resource exhaustion

title: Epic: Add Dependency Injection Framework
description: Implement Wire or Fx for dependency injection to manage all those layers we're about to create

title: Add Observer pattern for game events
description: EventObserver interface, notify observers on state changes (score, collision, food)

title: Add GraphQL API layer
description: gqlgen schema for querying game state, subscriptions for real-time updates

title: Setup Wire dependency injection
description: Add google/wire, create wire.go with provider sets for all layers

title: Create gRPC service definitions
description: Define .proto files for GameEngine, CollisionDetector, FoodGenerator, ScoreTracker services

title: Implement rate limiting
description: Token bucket algorithm, per-user/IP limits with Redis

title: Add AI opponent with machine learning
description: Train neural network to play snake, A* pathfinding alternative

title: Add Builder pattern for Snake configuration
description: SnakeBuilder with fluent API for configuring initial position, length, speed

title: Create domain layer entities
description: Extract Point, Snake, Direction types into internal/domain/entities package with proper value objects

title: Epic: Add Message Queue System
description: RabbitMQ or Kafka for async event processing between services

title: Add MongoDB for analytics
description: Store gameplay analytics, heatmaps of snake movements, death locations
